explains: n. 锦标赛；冠军称号，冠军地位；捍卫，拥护

sentences.en: He went on to take the championship.
sentences.cn: 他继续卫冕了冠军称号。

sentences.en: She's won the championship three years running.
sentences.cn: 她已连续三年获得冠军。

sentences.en: They've held the championship for the past two years.
sentences.cn: 他们在过去的两年里一直保持着冠军地位。
